thread.title: West Ham United to win

title: West Ham United to win
text:
A London derby is on offer on Saturday (18/01/2025), as West Ham United host Crystal Palace in Graham Potter’s second home game in charge of the Hammers. Below, we’ve compiled some Bet Builder Tips ahead of the game.
A London derby is on offer on Saturday (18/01/2025), as West Ham United host Crystal Palace in Graham Potter’s second home game in charge of the Hammers. Below, we’ve compiled some Bet Builder Tips ahead of the game.
BuildABet: Lucas Paqueta, Tomas Soucek, Daniel Munoz and Will Hughes to commit a foul, BTTS. -12/5
Lucas Paqueta has received six yellow cards this season and has committed 1.4 fouls per game.
Tomas Soucek has received six yellow cards this season and committed 1.4 fouls per game.
Daniel Munoz has received five yellow cards this season and has committed 1.5 fouls per game.
Will Hughes has received seven yellow cards this season and has committed two fouls per game.
Expect goals in this fixture, as both teams have scored in nine of the last ten meetings.
NEW CUSTOMERS ONLY. FIRST SINGLE & E/W BET ONLY. ODDS OF 1/1 OR GREATER. 4 X £10 BET TOKENS. FREE BET STAKES NOT INCLUDED IN RETURNS. FREE BETS ARE NON WITHDRAWABLE. FREE BETS EXPIRE AFTER 30 DAYS. ELIGIBILITY RESTRICTIONS AND FURTHER T&CS APPLY. 18+. GAMBLEAWARE.ORG. 18+.
BuildABet: Mohammed Kudus to score, Tomas Soucek to commit a foul, Jean-Philippe Mateta to score & Will Hughes to commit a foul. -12/1
Mohammed Kudus has averaged 0.9 shots on target per game this season.
Jean-Philippe Mateta has scored twice in his last two league appearances.
Tomas Soucek has received six yellow cards this season and committed 1.4 fouls per game.
Will Hughes has received seven yellow cards this season and has committed two fouls per game.
